mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.key1 "key1", t.value "value" from t_keyvalue t where 1=1 and key1=#{key1} and value=#{value} order by id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from (select 1 from t_keyvalue t where 1=1 and key1=#{key1} and value=#{value} ) a
select t.id "id", t.key1 "key1", t.value "value" from t_keyvalue t where 1=1
mapper.insert: insert into t_keyvalue ( id ,key1 ,value ) values ( id ,#{key1} ,#{value} )
mapper.update: update t_keyvalue set id=#{id} ,key1=#{key1} ,value=#{value} where 1=1 and id=#{id} and key1=#{key1} and value=#{value}
mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.key1 "key1", t.value "value" from t_keyvalue t where 1=1 and id=#{id} and key1=#{key1} and value=#{value}
mapper.delete: delete from t_keyvalue where 1=1 and id=#{id}
